General.Name: Talos Energy
General.Description: Talos Energy Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and production of oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the United States and Mexico. It also engages in the development of carbon capture and sequestration. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 333 Clay Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
